mapper.select:
select * from ( select row_number() over(order by n_bno desc) rnum , a.* from ( select * from n_board
where ${category} like '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
where n_btitle like '%'||#{searchWord}||'%' or n_bcontent like '%'||#{searchWord}||'%' or n_btype like '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
order by n_bno desc) a) where rnum between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
mapper.update: update n_board set n_btype=#{n_btype}, n_btitle=#{n_btitle},n_bcontent=#{n_bcontent},n_bdate=sysdate, n_bfile=#{n_bfile} where n_bno=#{n_bno}
